Reviews.Title: 4 gig internal memory, 2 gig for applications, small physical size, with dual micro sim.
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: BREED provided very good customer support in selling this phone.I prefer the small size of this phone and the 4 gig internal memory. This is an upgrade to an older model I own that only had 500 meg internal memory which was insufficient to install a GPS application. This model has plenty of memory and a newer version of Android to manage memory use better.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 2100 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Fame S6812 Unlocked GSM Dual-SIM Android Cell Phone - White
